meanings.definition: In a discontented or rebellious manner.
meanings.sent1: She sighed malcontentedly as she realized she had forgotten her lunch again.
meanings.sent2: The child stomped malcontentedly after being told it was bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed malcontentedly when its favorite toy rolled under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered malcontentedly, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The old man grumbled malcontentedly about the noisy neighbors.

meanings.definition: Feeling or expressing discontent or dissatisfaction.
meanings.sent1: The malcontentedly student refused to participate in the group project.
meanings.sent2: Her malcontentedly expression made it clear she was not enjoying the party.
meanings.sent3: The malcontentedly customer demanded to speak to the manager about the service.
meanings.sent4: The malcontentedly atmosphere in the office was palpable as rumors of layoffs spread.
meanings.sent5: The malcontentedly employee constantly complained about the new company policies.
